Sentence.sentence: Renewables account for only a small share of global primary energy consumption, which is still dominated by fossil fuels—30% each for coal and oil, 25% for natural gas.
Sentence.come: 出自-2017年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Natural gas and coal—also fossil fuels—have similarly seen price declines that look to be long-lived.
Sentence.come: 出自-2017年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Coal and natural gas are mainly used for electricity generation, whereas oil is used mostly to power transportation, yet the prices of all these energy sources are linked.
Sentence.come: 出自-2017年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: They also, however, use far more natural resources—fuel, water ( ' , all those baths and golf courses) and building materials.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: One recent study warns us of the danger of the exhaustion of natural resources on Earth.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: It is difficult to find solid evidence to prove environmental friendliness generates more profits than exploiting the natural environment.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: In other words, poor and rich both over-exploit the natural world, but for different reasons.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: If our economies are to flourish, if global poverty is to be eliminated and if the well-being of the world's people enhanced—not just in this generation but in succeeding generations—we must make sure we take care of the natural environment and resources on which our economic activity depends.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: And the World Resources Institute ( ' , WRI) in its World Resources 2005 report, issued at the end of August, produced several such examples from Africa and Asia; it also demonstrated that environmental degradation affects the poor more than the rich, as poorer people derive a much higher proportion of their income directly from the natural resources around them.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: A politician noted for being cautious asserts that sustainable human development depends on the natural environment.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: The negative impacts of natural disasters can be seen everywhere.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: A study by the Centre for Research on the Epidemiology of Disasters finds that, between 1980 and 2007, nearly 8,400 natural disasters killed more than twomillion people.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: It is natural for students to make complaints about university education.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Antarctica's harsh natural conditions constitute huge obstacles to the exploitation of its resources.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: And while assessments vary widely, geologists estimate that Antarctica holds at least 36 billion barrels of oil and natural gas.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: According to geologists' estimates, Antarctica has enormous reserves of oil and natural gas.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Whether it is a transition from imported to domestic oil or from coal-powered electricity production to natural-gas power plants, politicians love to talk big.
Sentence.come: 出自-2015年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: But it is natural to desire to do so for special occasions.
Sentence.come: 出自-2014年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: However, a further increase in farming area without impacting unfavourably on what remains of the world's natural ecosystems appears unlikely.
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Indeed, on a global scale, fertiliser manufacturing consumes about 3-5% of the world's annual natural gas supply
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: A further expansion of farming area will adversely impact on the world's natural ecosystems.
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Dakota Gasification of North Dakota captures CO2 at a plant that converts coal into synthetic natural gas.
Sentence.come: 出自-2012年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: To increase the volume and the speed with which we move natural resources through the consumer economy to the junk pile or the waste heap.
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: Muir's learning in observation throughout his life led him to devote his last years to preserving the natural environment.
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: Explain certain natural phenomena
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: But there are a lot of products that we eat today that are considered natural that are produced in a similar manner," Genovese said.
Sentence.come: 出自-2012年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: They are not as natural as we believed
Sentence.come: 出自-2012年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: "It's nothing new, it's nothing too complicated and it's natural because lots of people have TV remotes," says Rodriguez.
Sentence.come: 2019年6月六级真题（第一套）阅读 Section C

Sentence.sentence: Although the planned operation will be located more than miles away, drawing the soda ash in through pipelines, conservationists worry it could still upset the natural water cycle and breeding grounds.
Sentence.come: 2017年12月六级真题（第三套）阅读 Section C

Sentence.sentence: And the World Resources Institute WR in its World Resources 2005 report, issued at the end of August, produced several such examples from Africa and Asia; It also demonstrated that environmental degradation affects the poor more than the rich, as poorer p
Sentence.come: 2016年6月六级真题（第三套）阅读 Section B

Sentence.sentence: At a time when natural history was a valuable tool for discovery, Merian discovered facts about plants and Insects that were not previously known.
Sentence.come: 2018年12月六级真题（第二套）阅读 Section B

Sentence.sentence: Basically we turned our skin darker to serve as a natural sun protector in the place of the hair we lost.
Sentence.come: 2019年6月六级真题（第一套）听力 Section C

Sentence.sentence: Feeling both positive and negative emotions is a natural part of being human.
Sentence.come: 2016年12月六级真题（第二套）听力 Section C

Sentence.sentence: It's in these populations that we begin to see real changes in the genetic makeup of natural coloring.
Sentence.come: 2019年6月六级真题（第一套）听力 Section C

Sentence.sentence: Maria Droujkova is a founder of Natural Math, and has taught basic calculus concepts to 5-year-olds.
Sentence.come: 2018年12月六级真题（第二套）阅读 Section C

Sentence.sentence: Natural talent helps in some way, but at the end of the day you really do need to work hard and get really, really good at what you do.
Sentence.come: 2016年12月六级真题（第二套）听力 Section A

Sentence.sentence: Perhaps with the tools of this new technological revolution, we will be able to undo some of the damage done to the natural world by the last one—industrialization.
Sentence.come: 2019年6月六级真题（第一套）阅读 Section C

Sentence.sentence: Psychologists call them "masters of deception", those rare individuals with a natural ability to tell, with complete confidence, when someone is telling a lie.
Sentence.come: 2018年12月六级真题（第一套）听力 Section C

Sentence.sentence: The World Meteorological Organization points to Cuba and Bangladesh as examples of countries that have successfully reduced the loss of life caused by natural disasters by taking preventive action.
Sentence.come: 2016年6月六级真题（第二套）听力 Section C

Sentence.sentence: These practices include grazing animals on grasses grown from the pastureland's natural seed bunk, and fertilized by the cows' own fertilizer.
Sentence.come: 2019年12月六级真题（第三套）阅读 Section B

Sentence.sentence: They also, however, use far more natural resources—fuel, water all those baths and golf courses and building materials.
Sentence.come: 2016年6月六级真题（第三套）阅读 Section B

Sentence.sentence: This is in comparison with a drop of just under 1% in the total yogurt and kefir market according to natural and organic market research company SpiNS.
Sentence.come: 2019年12月六级真题（第三套）阅读 Section B

Sentence.sentence: What we did in our ancestry was to produce more permanent natural coloring in our skin cells.
Sentence.come: 2019年6月六级真题（第一套）听力 Section C

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些形容词均含"规则的，正常的，正规的"之意。
means: normal ： 指不超过某种限度、符合某种标准或常规。
ordinary ： 强调一般性和普通性，含不突出的意味。
regular ： 指已有模式、有规律或定期的。
natural ： 侧重某人或某物的行为符合其固有特性。
typical ： 指个体能体现出群体的特征。

list.explanation: 天生有特定出色才能的人

example.en: She is a natural on the piano.

example.zh: 他天生是踢足球的料子。

list.explanation: (掷骰子)骰子掷出7点或11 点(即最好的、准能赢的组合)
自然会成功的事，一定立刻奏效的东西

example.zh: 这方法十拿九稳一定灵。

example.en: He received a natural for robbery.
example.zh: 他因抢劫罪被判了七年徒刑。

list.explanation: (黑人用语)黑人，黑人蓬蓬松松的发型

example.en: Terry's a natural, and I'll do anything for him.
example.zh: 特里是个黑人，我会为他做任何事。

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表名词"人,物,状态"; 2. 地方; 3. 表形容词,"……的"

word_mean: 天然的，自然的：非人工的，非病理的

Sentence.sentence: Any smell might attract natural enemies that would try to eat the little comforting pats.
Sentence.come: 2016年高考英语四川卷 语法填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: As natural architects, the pueblo Indians figured out exactly how thick the adobe walls needed to be to make the cycle work on most days.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语全国卷2 语法填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: Canning is a natural extension of the planting she does.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语湖北卷 阅读理解 阅读B 原文

Sentence.sentence: Consequently, she succeeded in making a kind of candy only using natural sweeteners, which can reduce oral bacteria.
Sentence.come: 2019年高考英语北京卷 阅读理解 阅读B 原文

Sentence.sentence: Curiosity gave us all a natural awareness.
Sentence.come: 2018年高考英语天津卷 阅读理解 阅读D 原文

Sentence.sentence: Dawson did not have any of the natural conveniences of cities like London or Paris.
Sentence.come: 2018年高考英语全国卷3 阅读理解 阅读B 原文

Sentence.sentence: Hearing these stories, I'm skeptical about the place — other destinations are described as "purer" natural experiences.

Sentence.sentence: It allows one to work in the natural environment.
Sentence.come: 2019年高考英语全国卷I 阅读理解 阅读A 选项

Sentence.sentence: It is only natural that we lose faith, trust and confidence in a person who is tardy.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语陕西卷 阅读理解 阅读B 原文

Sentence.sentence: It starts with looking inside yourself and understanding who you are with respect to the natural world and how you approach the gardening process.
Sentence.come: 2016年高考英语全国卷2 阅读理解 七选五 原文

Sentence.sentence: It's become natural to check facts as I write, taking a minute or two to dip into pubmed, wikipedia, or other websites.
Sentence.come: 2016年高考英语江苏卷 阅读理解 阅读D 原文

Sentence.sentence: Many animals give off pheromones — natural chemicals that can be detected by, and then can produce a response in, other animals of the same species.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语上海卷 完形填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: Natural minerals contain more precious metals.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语江苏卷 阅读理解 阅读B 选项

Sentence.sentence: Others say it's only natural that newcomers learn the language of their host nation, seeing it as a condition to ensure they can contribute to society.
Sentence.come: 2017年高考英语浙江卷（6月） 阅读理解 阅读C 原文

Sentence.sentence: Perhaps evolution provided human babies with curiosity and a natural drive to explain their worlds, and adult scientists simply make use of the same drive that served them as children.
Sentence.come: 2016年高考英语浙江卷（6月） 阅读理解 阅读C 原文

Sentence.sentence: Recently, people have begun studying the connection between the natural world and healing.
Sentence.come: 2019年高考英语全国卷I 阅读理解 七选五 原文

Sentence.sentence: Some of them are also later sold, in order to limit the number of ponies according to the rules set by natural england.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语湖北卷 阅读理解 阅读A 原文

Sentence.sentence: The natural beauty isn't attractive to them.
Sentence.come: 2018年高考英语天津卷 阅读理解 阅读D 选项

Sentence.sentence: They pump out perfumes designed to attract different insects who are natural enemies to the attackers.
Sentence.come: 2017年高考英语全国卷2 阅读理解 阅读D 原文

Sentence.sentence: Unfortunately, you must carry the necessary equipment with you, since it's all but impossible to find natural substitutes.
Sentence.come: 2017年高考英语全国卷1 阅读理解 阅读D 原文

Sentence.sentence: We are surrounded by a natural playground just perfect for walking, caving, climbing and cycling.
Sentence.come: 2019年高考英语江苏卷 阅读理解 阅读A 原文

Sentence.sentence: Well before the arrival of freezers, there was a demand for ice for food preservation and catering, malcolm will explain the history of importing natural ice and the technology of building ice wells, and how London's ice trade grew.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语全国卷1 阅读理解 阅读A 原文

Sentence.sentence: Wherever human light spills into the natural world,  some aspect or life is affected.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语浙江卷 阅读理解 阅读C 原文

Sentence.sentence: With their patience and efforts, they successfully developed a combination of artificial breeding and natural reproduction.
Sentence.come: 2019年高考英语江苏卷 完形填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: You could apply to be a stewardship youth ranger and work on local natural resource management projects for eight weeks this summer.
Sentence.come: 2019年高考英语全国卷I 阅读理解 阅读A 原文

Sentence.sentence: In the former case the education is incidental; it is natural and important, but it is not the express reason of the association.
Sentence.come: 出自-2009年考研翻译原文

Sentence.sentence: This tendency in the natural sciences has long been evident in the social sciences too.
Sentence.come: 出自-2012年考研翻译原文

Sentence.sentence: On display here are various fantasy elements whose reference, at some basic level, seems to be the natural world.
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年考研翻译原文

Sentence.sentence: 95 knit miniskirt in all its 2,300-pius stores around the world, it must rely on low-wage overseas labor, order in volumes that strain natural resources, and use massive amounts of harmful chemicals.
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年考研阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: A century ago Octavia Hill launched the National Trust not to rescue stylish houses but to save“the beauty of natural places for everyone forever”.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年考研阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: To limit the number of telescopes on Mauna Kea, old ones will be removed at the end of their lifetimes and their sites returned to a natural state.
Sentence.come: 出自-2017年考研阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: A recent paper, titled "The Natural Selection of Bad Science", published on the Royal Society's open science website, attempts to answer this intriguing and important question.
Sentence.come: 2020年考研真题（英语一）翻译 Section Ⅲ

Sentence.sentence: And after going to school for 12 years, it doesn't feel natural to spend a year doing something that isn't academic.
Sentence.come: 2017年考研真题（英语二）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

Sentence.sentence: And in that, once more, we need to look to the example of our children, to whom happiness is not a goal but a natural byproduct of the way they live.
Sentence.come: 2016年考研真题（英语二）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

Sentence.sentence: For H&M to offer a $5.95 knit miniskirt in all its 2,300 -plus stores around the world, it must rely on low-wage overseas labor, order in volumes that strain natural resources, and use massive amounts of harmful chemicals.
Sentence.come: 2013年考研真题（英语一）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

Sentence.sentence: I had not realised how profoundly marketing trends dictated our perception of what is natural to kids, including our core beliefs about their psychological development.
Sentence.come: 2012年考研真题（英语二）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

Sentence.sentence: That might seem rather an obscure point, but it sets the tone for an exhibition that contains a lot of black-and-white photographs and relatively few natural objects.
Sentence.come: 2014年考研真题（英语二）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

means.word_mean: 自然的, 天然的

sentences.en: Social problems cropped up in the wake of natural disasters.
sentences.cn: 自然灾害之后, 出现了许多社会问题。

sentences.en: In addition to natural rivers, the Chinese working people have dug many canals.
sentences.cn: 除了天然的河流之外, 中国劳动人民还开挖了许多运河。

means.word_mean: 表现自然的, 不做作的，不拘束的

sentences.en: He spoke in quite a natural voice.
sentences.cn: 他说话声音很自然。

sentences.en: Try to look natural for your photograph.
sentences.cn: 拍照时要自然一点。

sentences.en: Children are usually more natural in their manner than adults.
sentences.cn: 孩子们的举止通常比成年人自然。

sentences.en: The movie star is always natural with other people.
sentences.cn: 那个影星对其他人总是很自然。

sentences.en: It is natural that he should say so.
sentences.cn: 他那样说是理所当然的。

means.word_mean: 天生的, 生来的，本来的，与生俱来的

sentences.en: He is a natural musician.
sentences.cn: 他是天生的音乐家。

sentences.en: Fighting is natural to dogs.
sentences.cn: 狗生性爱斗。

means.word_mean: 正常的，自然的，意料之中的
天赋的，天生具有某种能力的
有血缘关系的，亲生的
非婚生的，私生的
符合人的理性的，正常的，自然的
本位音的，标有还原号的（书写符号为 L）
非常适合或肯定成功的人或事物

sentences.en: She is the natural for this job.
sentences.cn: 她是做这项工作的理想人选。

means.word_mean: 有天赋的人，擅长做某事的人；本位音，还原音，本位号（书写符号为  L） </seg>

天赋的；天生具有某种能力的

sentence.cn: 通常在我写作的时候，为了查阅事实，我会花一两分钟时间浏览医脉通、维基百科或其他网站。
sentence.en: It’s become natural to check facts as I write,  taking a minute or two to dip into PubMed, Wikipedia,  or other websites.
sentence.from: 2016年高考英语江苏卷 阅读理解 阅读D 原文

mean.mean: 正常的；自然的；意料之中的

means.word_mean: 天然的;正常的
其他释义
自然的;天生的
其他释义

entry.def: If you say that it is natural for someone to act in a particular way or for something to happen in that way, you mean that it is reasonable in the circumstances.
entry.tran: 自然的;正常的;合乎常情的

example.ex: It is only natural for youngsters to crave the excitement of driving a fast car...
example.tran: 年轻人追求开快车的刺激是太正常不过的事情。

example.ex: It is only natural that he should resent you...
example.tran: 他怨恨你是很自然的事。

entry.def: Natural behaviour is shared by all people or all animals of a particular type and has not been learned.
entry.tran: (行为)出于本性的，生来就有的

example.ex: Anger is the natural reaction we experience when we feel threatened or frustrated.
example.tran: 我们觉得受到威胁或遭受挫折时本能地会感到气愤。

entry.def: Someone with a natural ability or skill was born with that ability and did not have to learn it.

example.ex: She has a natural ability to understand the motives of others...
example.tran: 她有一种洞察他人动机的天赋。

example.ex: He had a natural flair for business.

entry.def: If you say that someone is a natural, you mean that they do something very well and very easily.

example.ex: He's a natural with any kind of engine...
example.tran: 他天生就会摆弄各种发动机。

example.ex: She proved to be a natural on camera.
example.tran: 事实证明她在镜头前很有表演天赋。

entry.def: If someone's behaviour is natural, they appear to be relaxed and are not trying to hide anything.
entry.tran: 轻松自如的;不局促的;不做作的

example.ex: Bethan's sister was as friendly and natural as the rest of the family...
example.tran: 贝唐的妹妹和她家的其他人一样友好、随意。

example.ex: Hannah's natural manner reassured her, and she relaxed.
example.tran: 汉娜轻松自然的举止消除了她的疑虑，于是她放松了下来。

entry.def: Natural things exist or occur in nature and are not made or caused by people.
entry.tran: 非人为的;自然的;天然的

example.ex: It has called the typhoon the worst natural disaster in South Korea in many years...
example.tran: 它称这次台风为韩国多年来最严重的自然灾害。

example.ex: The gigantic natural harbour of Poole is a haven for boats.
example.tran: 巨型天然港普尔港是船只的避风港。

entry.def: Someone's natural parent is their biological father or mother, as opposed to an adult who is looking after them or has adopted them. Someone's natural child is their biological son or daughter, as opposed to a child they are looking after or have adopted.
entry.tran: (父母或子女)亲生的，有血缘关系的

example.ex: She has been reunited with her natural mother...
His commitments to the stepchildren will not reduce his obligation to his natural children.
example.tran: 他对继子女的关爱和投入不会减少他对亲生孩子的责任。

entry.def: In music, a natural note is the ordinary note, not its sharp or flat form.
entry.tran: (音符)本位音的，标有还原号的

entry.def: If someone dies of or from natural causes, they die because they are ill or old rather than because of an accident or violence.

example.ex: According to the Home Office, your brother died of natural causes...
example.tran: 根据内政部的调查，你哥哥属正常死亡。

example.ex: A prisoner collapsed and died yesterday, apparently from natural causes.
example.tran: 一名囚犯昨天突然倒下死了，看上去像是正常死亡。

means.word_mean: 1. someone regarded as certain to succeed;
2. a notation cancelling a previous sharp or flat
3. (craps) a first roll of 7 or 11 that immediately wins the stake
1. in accordance with nature; relating to or concerning nature;
2. existing in or produced by nature; not artificial or imitation;
3. existing in or in conformity with nature or the observable world; neither supernatural nor magical;
4. functioning or occurring in a normal way; lacking abnormalities or deficiencies;

sentences.sentence: "a grandparent's natural affection for a grandchild"

means.word_mean: 5. of a key containing no sharps or flats;
6. unthinking; prompted by (or as if by) instinct;

sentences.sentence: "offering to help was as instinctive as breathing"

means.word_mean: 7. (used especially of commodities) in the natural unprocessed condition;
8. related by blood; not adopted;
9. being talented through inherited qualities;
10. unaffected and natural looking;

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English (in the sense 'having a certain status by birth'): from Old French, from Latin naturalis, from natura 'birth, nature, quality' (see nature)

sentences.cn: 我们每个人都会变老，这一般被认为是生命中自然的一部分。把这样的事情称为“疾病”似乎是愚蠢的。
sentences.en: Aging happens to all of us, and is generally thought of as a natural part of life. It would seem silly to call such a thing a “disease.”
sentences.from: 17年12月四级真题(第二套)| 阅读

sentences.cn: 其实, 不做作,流于自然的爱情才是细水长流的.
sentences.en: Actually, only love in a natural waycan go on little by little without stream.

sentences.cn: 维生素, 有效地破坏了活性氧, 从而使身体对运动产生的自然的反应时间变短.
sentences.en: The vitamins, by efficiently destroying the reactive oxygen , short circuit the body's natural response to exercise.

sentences.cn: 合作抵御包括疾病在内的自然的侵害,是人际社会形成的重要根据.
sentences.en: A rational the establishment of human society is against the intrusion of natural disasters including disease.

sentences.cn: 这些男孩把裸体看作是很自然的事.
sentences.en: The boys treated nudity as a natural thing.

sentences.cn: 要发现你自然的道路, 对你的喜好与厌恶, 成功与失败做一个记录.
sentences.en: To identify your natural path, keep a record of your likes and dislikes, successes and failures.

sentences.cn: 孩子们长大以后离开家庭是很自然的事.
sentences.en: It's natural for children to grow away from their family.

sentences.cn: 最简朴、最自然的社会结构是最好的.
sentences.en: The simplest and most natural structure of society is the best.

sentences.cn: 用一种自然的方式显示个人魅力.
sentences.en: To display personal charm in a casual and natural way.

sentences.cn: 疏忽的作者会陷入他们从来没想到过的错误,这一点是很自然的(乔治·贝克莱).
sentences.en: It is natural for careless writers to run into faults they never think ofGeorge Berkeley.

sentences.cn: 工具栏是极其自然的,它们和下拉菜单提供相同的功能.
sentences.en: It is perfectly natural that these selectors be on the toolbar.

sentences.cn: 精致优雅的经典指环,透著自然的灵活性.
sentences.en: With refined elegance, this statement ring is imbued with a natural versatility.

sentences.cn: 整个站房在远山的衬托下, 体现建筑与自然的共生.
sentences.en: Whole station room is in of far hill foil below, reflect building and natural accrete.

sentences.cn: 他爱上那位美丽的姑娘是很自然的事.
sentences.en: It is natural that he should fall in love with such a beautiful girl.

sentences.cn: 一旦野生动物趋进灭亡, 大自然的生态环境也将随之毁灭.
sentences.en: Once the wild were on the verge of extinction, the natural ecology be ruined.

sentences.cn: 森林自然的原始气息与酒店舒适轻松的住宿环境形成了强烈的对比.
sentences.en: The primitive forest natural breath and hotel comfortable accommodation formed sharp contrast.

sentences.cn: 这不过是一颗年轻火热的心灵中强烈的爱慕之情非常自然的表现.
sentences.en: It was but the natural consequence of a strong affection in a young and ardent mind.

sentences.cn: 他们都是大自然的赋予.
sentences.en: They are natural given.

sentences.cn: 还能够去野外钓鱼,感受大自然的美妙!
sentences.en: Can go wild fishing and feel the natural beauty!

sentences.cn: 国家的本质不同于世界的本质这是很自然的.
sentences.en: It's natural that national natures differ from international natures.

sentences.cn: 这款戒指以盛放中的花朵为灵感, 将您对大自然的喜爱表露无遗.
sentences.en: Inspired by a flower in full blossom, this ring shows your affinity to all things natural.

sentences.cn: 他那蓬乱的头发和自然的魅力给一个以循规蹈矩著称的政党带来了清新感觉.
sentences.en: His shaggy hair and natural charisma were refreshing in a party best known for conformity.

sentences.cn: 人与自然的不协调发展导致了自然灾害发生频次的不断上升.
sentences.en: Uncoordinate developing of hunan with nature lead to natural disaster amount have been increasing.

sentences.cn: 他把目光投向了湘西自然的生命形态.
sentences.en: He focused on the natural life of Xiangxi.

sentences.cn: 怎样设法利用管制员的atc知识的自然的组织?
sentences.en: How can design make use of the controller's natural organization of ATC knowledge?

sentences.cn: 为了让病人放心,治疗师说,有这种好奇和愿望是自然的.
sentences.en: The therapist says reassuringly that it is a natural to have such curiosity and such wishes.

sentences.cn: 海洋微生物是抗肿瘤活性物质的重要来源.
sentences.en: The marine environment is beprolific source of new natural antitumor products.

sentences.cn: 介绍了天然高分子物质的应用现状,讨论了它们的应用前景.
sentences.en: The situation of application for natural macromolecule was introduced. The Applicable aspect of macromolecule was discussed.

sentences.cn: 人们希望,基于天然物质的治疗可能会较少地产生耐药性.
sentences.en: The hope is that treatment based on natural products might be less susceptible to resistance.

sentences.cn: 本文实验研究了辣椒中天然防腐物质的提取方法.
sentences.en: The experiment researched the method of extracting natural preservation material from chilli.

sentences.cn: 人的肉身终究会腐朽, 自然也在不断进行着物质的更迭.
sentences.en: Person's body will eventually decay, natural substances are also ongoing change.

sentences.cn: 猫天生的敏捷灵活
sentences.en: the natural agility of a cat

sentences.cn: 狗和猫似乎是天生的敌人.
sentences.en: The dog and the cat seem to be natural enemies.

sentences.cn: 其实, 秩序与效率在美国也并非天生的.
sentences.en: Actually, order and efficiency are not natural to the U.S.

sentences.cn: 天生的能力, 工作的态度和天赋.
sentences.en: Natural ability, work ethic and just talent.

sentences.cn: 你将是一个天生的领袖在这段时间.
sentences.en: You will be a natural leader during this time.

sentences.cn: 他们身上浓重的气味完全是天生的,对此大可不必紧张.
sentences.en: The strong smell that presides around is entirely natural and should be no cause for alarm.

sentences.cn: 他是天生的音乐家.
sentences.en: He is a natural musician.

sentences.cn: 她既有天生的谦恭有礼的举止,又有坚定不移的信念.
sentences.en: She had a natural courtesy combined with an unshakable conviction.

sentences.cn: 此外, 在四个孩子中排行老三的亨利相信,他是天生的调解人.
sentences.en: Moreover, as the third of four children, he believes he is a natural peacemaker.

sentences.cn: 但是我有一种感觉,我是那种可以称作天生的自学者的人.
sentences.en: But I have a feeling that I am what I may call a natural student.

sentences.cn: 如同往常一样, 他觉得自己一踏进这个地方, 那种天生的感情洋溢的性格顿时就化为乌有.
sentences.en: As always, when he came here , he felt his natural ebullience desert him.

sentences.cn: 许多美国人都主张天生的相貌.
sentences.en: Many Americans are proponents of the all natural look.

sentences.cn: 但我们中的一些人并不是天生的乐天派. 我们该怎么做(才能使我们的生活变好) 呢 ?
sentences.en: But some of us are just not natural optimists. What are we supposed to do?

sentences.cn: 但仅凭这些天生的优势并不足以确保电视幸免于难.
sentences.en: Yet these natural advantages alone are not enough to ensure television's survival.

sentences.cn: 这种天生的移情和关怀让他们能够有效的帮助他人解决问题.
sentences.en: This natural empathy and caring helps to be really effective at helping others through problems.

sentences.cn: 中庸是必须学习的; 因为它不是你天生的品质.
sentences.en: Moderation has to be learned; it's not a natural trait.

sentences.cn: 同样,我们在天生的人格类型上也会有不同的天赋和弱点.
sentences.en: We also have different natural strengths and weaknesses that are part of our inherent personality type.

sentences.cn: 正如他自己所称,他是个天生的民主主义者.
sentences.en: He is just what he claims he is, a natural democrat.

sentences.cn: 婚后生活使她那种天生的神经质性格有了进一步的发展.
sentences.en: Marriage increased her natural nervousness.

sentences.cn: 跟天生的无知相比,表面的聪明不值一提.
sentences.en: I've learned that artificial intelligence no match for natural stupidity.

sentences.cn: 作为外交官,又是蒙古族人, 我是个天生的游牧者,似乎一生都在不断地履新和离别之间徘徊.
sentences.en: As a diplomat and someone who is ethnically Mongolian, I am a natural nomad.

sentences.cn: 她有一头天生的卷发.
sentences.en: Her hair has natural waves.

sentences.cn: 她的生活的外壳, 她的一切天生的羞怯和庄重, 全撕破了.
sentences.en: The outer crust of her life, all of her natural diffidence and reserve, was torn away.

sentences.cn: 他们是天生的喜剧演员,能将包含神秘 、 敏感和梦幻等各类情感完美地演绎.
sentences.en: They are natural comedians with just the right mix of mystical, sensitive, inspirational and impractical humor.

sentences.cn: 他对飞行器有天生的好奇心.
sentences.en: He has a natural curiosity about air crafts.

sentences.cn: 结婚后一个弹钢琴, 一个跳舞, 天生的一对, 真好!
sentences.en: Married a playing the piano, a dance, a natural right, very good!

sentences.cn: 这位演说家用苦练的方法克服了天生的口吃毛病.
sentences.en: By much pains, the orator overcame a natural impediment in his speech.

sentences.cn: 天生的才干如同天生的植物一样,需要靠学习来修剪.——培根.
sentences.en: Natural abilities are like natual plants that need pruning by study.

sentences.cn: 这个农民的儿子显示出一种天生的尊严和贵族的神态.
sentences.en: That son of peasants radiated a natural dignity and aristocratic bearing.

sentences.cn: 准备好利用自然不做作的时机和孩子谈论性.
sentences.en: Step 1 Be prepared to take advantage of natural opportunities toto kids about sex.

sentences.cn: 小孩儿的举止一般是不做作的.
sentences.en: A small child's behavior is usually natural.

sentences.cn: 它是关于象你能做的一样自然的事情.
sentences.en: It's about as natural a thing as you can do.

sentences.cn: 快乐是一件既简单又自然的事情.
sentences.en: Happiness is a natural and simple thing.

sentences.cn: 她们什么自然的事情也没有做过,如刨土(不知道是不是,猜想鸡貌似比较喜欢刨土),在草丛中寻找食物.
sentences.en: They are unable to do anything natural such as dust badging or foraging through the grass.

sentences.cn: 人被美丽的事物所吸引是很自然的事情.
sentences.en: It is natural for people to be attracted to beautiful things.

sentences.cn: 剧情在她的作品总是很自然的事情.
sentences.en: The plots in her works always very natural.

sentences.cn: 可是夫妻生小孩是很自然的事情.
sentences.en: But it's only natural that married couples have babies.

sentences.cn: 相应地, 在插入和打印操作中使用递归过程也是很自然的事情.
sentences.en: Accordingly, recursive routines for insertion and printing will be most natural.

sentences.cn: K1X将精力聚焦于篮球, 因此制作自有品牌的鞋品是很自然的事情.
sentences.en: Given their focus on basketball, branded footwear might seem like a natural extension for k 1 x.

sentences.cn: 一个神话是: 一个老故事,解释历史或者自然的事情.
sentences.en: A myth is: an old story explaining history or natural things.

sentences.cn: 把管理看做是一项专业是很自然的事情.
sentences.en: It is natural to view management as a profession.

sentences.cn: 当宠物离世后,我们感到悲痛是一件自然的事情.
sentences.en: Grieving is a natural reaction to the loss of a pet.

Sentence.sentence: Their daily routine followed the rhythm of the natural cycle.

Sentence.sentence: "right now, people think of aging as natural and something you can't control,'' he said.
Sentence.come: 2017年12月四级真题（第二套）阅读 Section C

Sentence.sentence: Aging happens to all of us, and is generally thought of as a natural part of life.
Sentence.come: 2017年12月四级真题（第二套）阅读 Section C

Sentence.sentence: But maybe what's inside is not so natural.
Sentence.come: 2019年12月四级真题（第二套）阅读 Section A

Sentence.sentence: Commenting on the find, snake expert Robert Henderson, from the milwaukee Museum of Natural history, said: "Worldwide new species of frogs are being discovered and described quite regularly."
Sentence.come: 2017年6月四级真题（第二套）听力 Section A

Sentence.sentence: Earlier this year, Italy signed an accord with UNESCO to establish a task force of police art detectives and archaeologists (考古学家) to protect cultural heritage from natural disasters and terror groups, such as IsiS.
Sentence.come: 2018年6月四级真题（第二套）阅读 Section B

Sentence.sentence: In 2018 alone, wildfires, volcanic eruptions, hurricanes, mudslides, and other natural disasters cost at least $49 billion in the United States.
Sentence.come: 2019年12月四级真题（第二套）阅读 Section B

Sentence.sentence: In other words, it refers to anything that is acquired or learnt, rather than instinctive or natural.
Sentence.come: 2019年6月四级真题（第二套）阅读 Section A

Sentence.sentence: Natural disasters can have a long-lasting impact on community life.
Sentence.come: 2019年12月四级真题（第二套）阅读 Section B

Sentence.sentence: Natural disasters can wreck a community 5s infrastructure, disrupting systems for months or years.
Sentence.come: 2019年12月四级真题（第二套）阅读 Section B

Sentence.sentence: Starting April 28 of this year, the National Museum of Natural history will begin renovating its fossil hall.
